name: service-business-dashboard
description: Multi-tenant SaaS dashboard for service businesses

scripts.migrate: docker compose exec backend npm run migrate
scripts.seed: docker compose exec backend npm run seed
scripts.test:local: npm run test:local:backend && npm run test:local:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.clean: docker compose down -v && docker system prune -f

author: Your Name
